title: Excel File Export
info: Easily download sentiment analysis data in a structured Excel format.
list: Export detailed reports with sentiment scores for each entry
Convenient format for data storage and sharing
Supports further analysis using Excel tools like filtering and sorting
Automatically organized into relevant columns (e.g., sentiment, date, text)
Saves time with one-click export functionality
Enables integration with other systems using Excel-compatible data
Provides a clear and accessible record of insights for presentations or decision-making

title: Graphical Representation
info: Visualize your sentiment data with insightful and dynamic graphs.
list: Offers bar charts, line graphs, and pie charts for clear data trends
Highlights sentiment distribution for better understanding of audience emotions
Real-time updates to reflect the latest analysis
Interactive visuals allow zooming and filtering
Simplifies complex data into easy-to-understand visuals
Aids in presenting findings to stakeholders effectively

title: Most Used Words Analysis
info: Discover the key words driving sentiment on your platform.
list: Identifies frequently used words in user feedback or text data
Highlights trends and recurring themes in communication
Helps refine communication strategies or product messaging
Saves time by automatically processing and displaying top words
Provides valuable insights for content or customer engagement improvements
